plot outline: Fortunately or unfortunately Dhyanchand, Harinanrayan and Lakhudas are cursed by one of their ancestors that the coming six generations will have to marry two times and if they don't, they will take birth as monkeys in their next lives. At present these three men's wives have left them and they share their common misery of loneliness and frustrated un-married life. Each of them desperately want to get married again but the question is who should marry first? which hence causes various internal conflicts amongst them.
title: Vandha Villas
plot: Fortunately or unfortunately Dhyanchand, Harinanrayan and Lakhudas are cursed by one of their ancestors that the coming six generations will have to marry two times and if they don't, they will take birth as monkeys in their next lives. At present these three men's wives have left them and they share their common misery of loneliness and frustrated un-married life. Each of them desperately want to get married again but the question is who should marry first? which hence causes various internal conflicts amongst them.
